items.content_html: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.

items.content_html: ChatCraft is a lightweight, user-friendly chatbot interface designed to showcase the power of Superflex for frontend development and Ollama for running efficient, open-source AI models locally. Whether you're building a simple conversational agent or exploring AI-powered interfaces, ChatCraft provides a seamless and modern experience.
items.title: MarcusMQF/ChatCraft: ChatCraft is a lightweight, user-friendly chatbot interface designed to showcase the power of Superflex for frontend development and Ollama for running efficient, open-source AI models locally. Whether you're building a simple conversational agent or exploring AI-powered interfaces, ChatCraft provides a seamless and modern experience.
